website_summaries.verdict: Amazon's 7-inch Kindle Fire HDX is the simplest high-quality small-screen tablet you can buy, and ease of use doesn't come at the cost of performance.
cons: Interface is very geared to buying things from Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should absolutely own one of these....more if you can afford it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a little biased as I love all things Amazon/Kindle but this was a Christmas prezzie to myself , I already had the previous version with less storage, I can honestly say I use it all day everyday for reading, watching Amazon Prime/Netflix & using the internet/social media/emails etc.. Obviously to fully enjoy these you need an Amazon Prim subscription (WELL worth the money and includes the Prime films/tv shows, free Prime next-day delivery etc) £79.99 for the year I think it is now, a Netflix subscription (I think that is about £6 a month??) and wi-fi to connect to. Everyone should absolutely have one of these....more than one if you can afford it ;)
customer_reviews.author: The Shopping Angel

customer_reviews.title: handy device
customer_reviews.text: Bought in black Friday deals to replace kindle touch so it easier for me read during the night without disturbing hubby better than using mobile and smaller than my tab 3 did consider paper white as it has light but my son said friends say battery rubbish on it so decided get this instead and if left awake and don't want to read I can always play games. Did think it be able to put my prime instant video mirrored onto TV screen as our living room TV doesn't have the amazon app but doesn't work as the TV doesn't have miracast not used the mobile data as up to now not had any need
customer_reviews.author: 2GSDMUM

customer_reviews.title: the Kindle Fire HD is amazing. A great investment of mine and I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this kindle fire a while ago now, I have been using it ever since. The processing speed is very good and I am very happy with this. The display quality is also great on this kindle fire HD. For a small 7" gadget it is amazing and runs very smoothly. I use this kindle throughout the week and will continue to do so until any technical faults, then I will definitely buy another. These are a lot cheaper than for example an iPad, yet almost do the same thing as one. I recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: R Knapman

customer_reviews.title: love this kindle hdx
customer_reviews.text: I love my new kindle. Brilliant picture much faster than the kindle 7hd It got mirroring built-in very useful with your smart tv The only thing I am disappointed in, the Bluetooth is not,compatible with my Samsung galaxy 4. Nice design and I like the power and volume button at the back rather than on top. Mayday,very good idea and even I haven't used it yet,sure it helping people getting better faster support. I can watch Netflix and prime ,download some films when on holiday, Although,the films could be newer and the episode could be cheaper. I love reading my books,listening to my audible. Long battery life
customer_reviews.author: Manuela

customer_reviews.title: this is fine. I wanted a Kindle I could read in ...
customer_reviews.text: If all you want is a tablet, this is fine. I wanted a Kindle I could read in the sun, with all the added extras of going online for emails, Facebook etc. No chance of using this tablet in the sun. Very disappointed with the screen. Totally reflective and impossible to read outside. Even with a non reflective adhesive cover on the glass, its still too reflective. I already have a basic Kindle which I love. Note to Amazon, give us an option of a HDX screen or a non reflective screen please !!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Precious

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my husband. He has never liked Apple so I wanted to find an android style tablet he could read books and magazines in and use for browsing the internet etc. this little tablet offered so much more! Great battery life, super for a work commute and a nice size to fit in a coat pocket or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Aisling

customer_reviews.title: Terrible screen with blue bands round the edge
customer_reviews.text: I really liked my original Fire, so th 64gb HDX looked like a good purchase. It's one I really regret though as the screen is terrible - specifically it's got horrible blue bands round the edge due to the use of blue LEDs for backlight. In addition I had to return my first one as it had bright spots as well. Both had the blue bands. The issue is more noticeable on a light background,so shows when you read books and look at the web. It's not really noticeable when watching films or playing games. I like Fire OS so I've given two stars rather than one, but really, at price this is a shockingly bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Webb

customer_reviews.title: Ok and not too clunky
customer_reviews.text: Like most android tablets (and iPad devices) this unit it limited as to file content it will play nicely with, if truth be told, slightly worse than basic android, but better than iPad in that regard. It is a lovely device however as stated has drawbacks, not least of which is the apps store, limited apps with many nice to have missing or not allowed. Battery life has proven to be ok as most tablets android can equal or best this. There are exclusive help features, which is nice, but the restrictions on software are a pain, missing basic things like other browser availability and due to its desire to sell, sell sell, even basic flexible music and video (flexible)
customer_reviews.author: A. Robb

customer_reviews.title: Why do this ???
customer_reviews.text: It's ok...but for 2 very annoying issues. Firstly, if you want to use it for anything that requires flash ...forget it. So that's 4OD out the window to name but one source. Secondly, I used my laptop to connect to Amazon prime/Netflix through my projector (garden movies on summer evenings). Marvellous, I thought, I can now hook up the kindle and have a much more compact unit. Except....you can't..... as the kindle isn't comparable ... There is NO tech reason for this and is something Amzon have engineered (as first gen models were able to do this). Otherwise it's adequate for the tasks required of it. But this is very annoying, given its actually a function Amazon have removed ...?!
customer_reviews.author: randombob

customer_reviews.title: One of my best Christmas presents
customer_reviews.text: Oh, yes, it did! After having trouble with my first Kindle Fire, which is three year old, my husband decided to give me this device as a Christmas present. Confronted with several options to choose and after a lot of consideration, I went for this type and I haven't regretted it. Screen is clearer, neat and very bright indeed. Sound is perfect and the mirror function was one of the decisive factors. I haven't tried yet but I am dying to display movies on my smart tv. Honestly, I don't use it beyond pure sheer entertainment or as a background companion when cleaning the house. However, it's brilliant and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diablita

customer_reviews.title: Very poor advert for Hi tech equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this version of Kindle had I been supplied with CLEAR instructions/information. However Amazon "Chat line" operatives were unable to help me . In fact some of them were rude . Presumed , because I am elderly (79) that I am stupid . Have returned product to Amazon , albeit reluctantly . Suggestion :- Amazon employ more understanding and knowledegable employees for their "Chat line". Even better :- supply explicit instructions , rather than hoping that everybody is computer literate. All in all :- Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tubbolard

customer_reviews.title: I wanted so much to like it - even bought one for my wife and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so much to like it - even bought one for my wife and another for my daughter. And the hardware is fine in every respect. BUT: the way Amazon has crippled its software is close to being a crime. An extremely meagre selection of apps and the seeming impossibility of freeing the device from accessing Google Play/Store make this (all three, in fact) device rarely used. No more Amazon hardware for me until the short-sighted and stupid restrictions are removed!
customer_reviews.author: Nils

customer_reviews.title: great kindle. Only bugbear is that you can't change ...
customer_reviews.text: great kindle. Only bugbear is that you can't change the default dictionary. I want to use a spanish-english dictionary and the kindle allows you to change the dictionary when you are looking up a word, but then it changes it back to the default for the next word. Real pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Francis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome present.
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Christmas present and it's awesome. I have been using it almost non-stop. The only down from the Kindle 2 which I was using before is that the battery doesn't last as long, but that's obviously a consequence of it having all the other functions and facilities. With the Kindle 2 the battery would last for weeks, but it was only an e-reader. The internet access was experimental and thus very poor. The Fire has so many other functions including video, music, email, facebook, internet, etc. and I have been reading books and comics on it. Some limitations due to the tablet format, but on the whole a wonderful device.
customer_reviews.author: Wildman

customer_reviews.title: priceless!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! My kindle is my constant companion. I have a large library. My kindle fire fits neatly into my handbag, so I am never stuck for something to read. It holds loads of puzzles and games. I have joined Amazon prime. The picture quality is better than my son's ipad. I have saved a fortune on next day delivery and the cloud space for all my photographs is priceless. My only down and its totally my fault is I wish I had bought a kindle with a back facing camera because the picture quality is so good I wouldn't need a camera. Well done kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline hemmings

customer_reviews.title: Making life more fascinating
customer_reviews.text: I saw my partners Kindle Fire DX, and decided to purchase mine straight away, despite being told to wait for my 80th birthday on the 6th February. I am not usually so impatient. My partner set up my Kindle Fire HD, and it is now my daily companion. To check and write my e mails. To use the Media Player to watch programmes I have missed. To use my BBS news, and weather Apps. Still more Apps to get. Finally to have my book kindle, and a complete record of my book reading. An excellent tool to use daily, and just having a cover made by a lady on the Isle of Harris, in Harris Tweed
customer_reviews.author: Rev. John E. Harris-white

customer_reviews.title: ... it but decided to give it one last try love it now I can use it wish I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time no charge in it plugged it in to charge up but when it was charged and turned on everything was in Chinese try every to get it back to english with help from comments on site but nothing worked it took my husband four days to get it back to english I had just a reader before which was very simple to set up and a list of language came up when first turned on was going to return it but decided to give it one last try love it now I can use it wish I bought one sooner can also read the book on my phone when at work saves me taking kindle
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my kindle and it is small enough to carry ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I have an ipad, I wanted a kindle so that I always have books to read but also have the option of connecting to the internet if required. The ipad is too big to fit in my handbag and I couldn't afford or really justify buying an ipad mini. I LOVE my kindle and it is small enough to carry in my bag where ever I go. I don't play games etc. on it so I couldn't comment on the apps. The apps it does come with - the usual facebook, you tube, email etc. all work great. Also you can sync everthing with your PC, ipad etc. through the kindle apps. Would definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty Product Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Waited for a long time and considered several options before deciding to get this tablet. It is easy to use, set up, connect to the internet and very versatile. It is the right size for portability without taking up too much room, while giving a good screen size for reading and browsing the net. Start up is quick, battery life is good and the viewing experience is excellent. I rarely use the laptop now. Bought this as it performs just as well, if not better than more expensive tablets. The deal clincher for me was the Kindle support. This service is excellent an invaluable. It puts this product well above any competition for me. Well done Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Treehugger

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: I ticket 5* because it is true. This Kindle and the rest of the family are top notch performers Buy a lens cover and a Leather surround which will aid Kindle to prop up on your chest whilst watching on netflix. I really can't say too much about this device, it's very fast, excellent colours and the stereo speakers really work.The processor is said to be 2.2 gig, and for Kit-Kat Android this is enormous and then some. Well done Kindle, far better than those rubbish 10.1 screen models you can buy on amazon, the answer is no!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID-MICHAEL GRUNDY

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire Review
customer_reviews.text: First class tablet, very fast, fantastic screen, good browser with it's reading pane but it lacks apps as you have to use Kindle app store. The advertising is annoying and you can't make your own home screen. Also to get the best from it you have to be a member of Prime which contrary to claims does not deliver next day or package Amazon items from one order together so you get charged extra. The spoken books sampled had a grating American accent so I did not purchase any. Its early days but Amazon need to do better.
customer_reviews.author: Gus360

customer_reviews.title: Great item but i bought it to play all my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item but i bought it to play all my music as it has a great sound to it but there was a popping sound in between every track and as amazon said they couldnt fix it even by sending me a new one or with an update i returned it for a full refund so if you read this and have one of these maybe you havnt noticed the popping sound or they have finally found an update to cure it
customer_reviews.author: mick bak2the7ts

customer_reviews.title: what a little wonder
customer_reviews.text: I have had the original kindle since early on, I didn't realise I wanted the HDX until my husband bought it for me for xmas. What a wonderful present. It fits in my handbag and is readily available to check me e-mail or facebook account. All my books were transferred automatically, I can use the device to order more books, or anything else I want. If I get bored there are plenty of games aps, free and pay ones. It is so easy to use, even for someone who has never used a tablet before. I've only had it 3 weeks, but I cannot imagine being without it. Would recommend this device for any age and ability.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. C. Lesworth

customer_reviews.title: I love this little box of tricks there are so many ...
customer_reviews.text: What do I say? I love this little box of tricks there are so many aps to download that cover my interests it is comfortable to hold and use and easy to navigate. I can surf the net and the screen size makes it easy to read the contents of the web pages. On and off button is easy to locate and the volume buttons are on the opposite side to the on off button so as long as I have it the right way up :) its easy to alter the volume. Got mine in the Christmas sales and so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMak

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire or Dying Embers
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these Kindle Fire's for Christmas 2014, one for myself and 2 for gifts. Unfortunately 6 months after the guarantee was up one doesn't work as it won't take a charge and mine keeps freezing when I use it for the internet and I have to get my laptop out instead. The only one still working is the one least used. None of them has been heavily used. I was also disappointed by not being able to read the screen at the beach (the main reason for buying it) because of the sun's reflection on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Karin -The Hamlet

customer_reviews.title: It's great for what I want!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I can watch netflix, listen to Spotify, read books, newspapers, magazines, shop online, browse the internet and play games...which is all I was looking for and therefore it is great for me. I can see why others may not like it as it is limited in the App Store and doesn't have the same high level functionality as other tablets, but I knew this before I brought it and knew what I wanted it for so I am very pleased. The screen is amazing quality, the sound is brilliant...really good for the price, and if you read what you are getting properly before you order, really shouldn't disappoint you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a Christmas present .I usually work on a PC, but wanted a lightweight product to use on the road. I mainly wanted a device for reading emails, and writing. First of all the display is crystal clear with sharp saturated colours. Watching movies on this is a pleasure. It connects to wifi quickly and the whole online experience is very smooth and fast. Most of what I require is the Amazon App store; but it's realtively straightforwards to root the device to be able to use nearly all Android apps. I've used a ipad mini, and I far prefer this. At the current discounted price this tablet is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Cineaste

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. I like the size - easy to carry in a handbag - but big enough screen to access the internet etc. and the images are crystal clear. The only thing I find a little strange and disappointing is that it doesn't have a back facing camera so I can't take photos with it as I can't see what I am taking. I am not into taking constant selfies!!! I do have a very good camera however and it is very easy to download my photos onto this tablet. Overall a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: cleverkiwi

customer_reviews.title: Only supports Amazon apps NO MORE eBay !!!! Buyer beware ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has decided to not support eBay !!! So now my tablet is no longer the does it all tool anymore... So meet another device now to access all my apps , my kindle is soon to be made redundant and in the bin...
customer_reviews.author: John  G

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: In our opinion this tablet is better in many respects to our iPad. Very easy to set up can access the Internet emails easily. The screen is clear and navigation simple. The only negative is the camera. It appears to be only suitable for selfies as it appears to be front facing only? Will contact Amazon to clarify this. The apps are good and the Amazon storage for downloading photos etc from mobile devices works well. Books can be downloaded quickly & cheaper than buying books. Originally purchased a basic kindle but upgraded to the HDX as Amazon had this on offer. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: A variety of options on Kindle HDX
customer_reviews.text: This item has provided more than I thought it would I am very pleased with it and I am learning more every day my original kindel was just for reading and this was a very good buy the HDX is as apush bike is to a rolls royce. Very pleased with both items over the moon with the HDX. I purchased the HDX to use as an audio device I have trouble holding a book up to read and have been using audio books since I had a spinal injury that just wont get better . the HDX has brought far more into my life as a result of its multiple functions . Thank you Kindle. Stephen Pollard
customer_reviews.author: stephen pollard

customer_reviews.title: Good value &  easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace a 1st generation Kindle and wasn't sure whether to get the Kindle Fire HDX or another tablet. A timely Amazon special deal persuaded me and I am very pleased with the product so far. I took it on holiday a week later and was a little disappointed by the reflected glare in bright sunlight (never a problem with the old Kindle book reader) but otherwise am pleased with the features and performance. The one drawback appears to be battery life which seems to an issue even when just reading a book - a day by the pool saw the battery expiring after what seemed like 7 or 8hrs not the 'up to 11hrs battery life' claimed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Newell

customer_reviews.title: I am also finding the tablet extremely useful as I can use it for all internet related ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present to replace my kobo touch as the kobo couldn't download some books that I wanted to read. So far the kindle has fully lived up to my expectations I have read a few books already and found the pages much clearer than the kobo. I am also finding the tablet extremely useful as I can use it for all internet related activity rather than using my laptop. Lovely clear screen and excellent sound thoroughly recommend. Only downside is that the charge only lasts about a day as it works like a smartphone whereas the kobo would last all week but then it could only be used for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Soulgirl

customer_reviews.title: Even used for reading!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my son who was 13 then and prone to leaving things in silly places, leading to their sad demise. He's had this over a year now, he uses it daily, it has travelled abroad, is used in the bathroom (for music) and is often a near permanent fixture in his hand. He uses it for games, internet, music, films and Reading! The last was something beyond my hopes and expectations, but something that I am very happy about. I would definitely recommend a kindle fire.
customer_reviews.author: SABR2004

customer_reviews.title: My new toy
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed reading a couple of novels so far. Bought a guide to Cape Town and would like to "return it" - if it was a book I could do that - but can't see how to return a downloaded book. The reason for this is that the holiday company I was hoping to travel with has cancelled the holiday. Unbelievably I was the only would-be holiday maker who booked their holiday!! Find it difficult, or slow, to get out of the book and back to the Home key. Enjoying looking at my e-mails on it, thus saving me from turning on the computer for little result. Still finding out its possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to me as a gift for Christmas and I love it was worried I wouldn't like the smaller screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Was bought to me as a gift for Christmas and I love it was worried I wouldn't like the smaller screen as I previously owned the kindle fire 8.9 but I'm surprised I prefer this one it's lighter and just nicer to hold the picture quality is really impressive I can't set it down ! Though I agree with other reviews about some of the issues with apps not being available is annoying but if like me you want to just browse the internet shop on Amazon and watch a few films it's perfect and feels like a luxury item.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my 5-year old B/W 3G kindle. I love it. It's fast, easy to use, good size to carry and I use it to browse the net as well as read kindle books. Not surprisingly, the battery need recharging every 2-days, which simply doesn't compare with my old kindle that lasted about two weeks per charge. Then again it is HDX, colour - not B/W- and since the browser works as well as my desktop computer, I probably use it for 4-5 hour a day and the Wi-Fi is never switched off - thus the power drain.
customer_reviews.author: frejul

customer_reviews.title: A real joy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Kindle Fire. It's the first one I've had and I'm really impressed. It's easy to use, quite intuitive and the apps download very quickly and easily. The only disappointment I've had with it is that Amazon don't allow you to download the Google store app that enables you to link to the Sky cloud, so I cannot access my Sky Wi-Fi while I'm out and about. It does link happily to my Sky Wi-Fi whilst at home though. All in all I'm very happy with it. The screen is clear and easy to read and the colours are bright and a real joy.
customer_reviews.author: Loopy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant tablet - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tablet...easily competes with the best Android tabs on the market but for only £99...amazing. Colours are bright and definition is sharp. The screen is really responsive and accurate. This was a Xmas gift for my 5 year-old daughter and she loves it...can barely get her off it. The parental controls are also excellent and very well though-out. You can set up a profile for your child and determine what he or she can access - the skin also changes to be more child-friendly and only shows those apps/books/videos etc that you allow access to. Even the camera can be restricted if you so desire.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" HDX Display
customer_reviews.text: I have never purchased anything like this before being a complete novice but I am thoroughly enjoying it and find it very easy to work with. Very pleased I bought it but I wish now I had bought a more expensive version that had a front and back camera as taking photos is not a very easy thing to do. I read somewhere that you cant get your internet banking details on it but you definitely can which is great for when you are away and need to check carefully each day. Would I recommend it - Yes but be warned about the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Very good display and sound
customer_reviews.text: Very good display and sound. You cannot download YouTube app, that shoud have been clearly! marked. But we were able to download different app, having spoken to IT help desk form Kindle. You cannot switch off all the advertising rubbish from the personal settings. You cannot manage your display pictures and other stuff which is being displayed and managed on the screen by Amazon Kindle. The little device is spying on you a lot! But my girlfriend likes it a lot. If you care about personal data do not buy it, otherwise it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase, came quickly, well package, didn't take long to charge and is easy to use. I am still going through all the features but so far so good, very clear screen which is great when watching you tube. I brought this to use when relaxing on the sofa to browse internet instead of balancing laptop on lap overall I think it's a very good buy and excellent value for money.......
customer_reviews.author: Ms Green

customer_reviews.title: When opening the fully sealed box I was very pleased it was complete
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant ordering this refurbished item, mainly worry over the appearance if there would be any defects showing marks etc., as the item has a full years warranty I was not worried about the processing side of the Kindle. When opening the fully sealed box I was very pleased it was complete, exactly as brand new, no marks on screen, case or anywhere on the item. Hopefully I will not have any problems but if I do it will be covered under the year warranty same as a non refurbished item. I would highly recommend anyone who was as indecisive as I was to order one. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: ... my two daughters (6 and 8) and am really pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these for my two daughters (6 and 8) and am really pleased with them. They are quick and easy to set up and have a number of parental controls that allow us to restrict access and the time they spend on them. Really only got them as we were constantly finding our own iPads Werner constantly flat but didn't want to spend a fortune on iPads for the girls. The Kindke works really well and the girls love the free range to download lots and lots of Apps from the Amazon App Store - the vast majority so far have been free and pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Specialized71

customer_reviews.title: Not the best model of an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Kindle for a while but I have to say that I am quite disappointed with it. The on button is difficult to locate and the screen doesn't react in the same way. My old faithful Kindle, purchased in 2012 gets the occasional glitch but is still easier to use than this newer model. I think it might end up as a gift for someone. It would be really helpful, when attempting to purchase a new Kindle if there was an in-depth model evaluation so that we could see immediately what the best points are. I'm sticking with my 2012 model until it dies!
customer_reviews.author: DD Abraham

customer_reviews.title: I love this device and I would recommend it to anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this device and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a bit of easy-to-use hand-held tech. It has internet and Skype, music and video streaming and download capability and it takes pretty good pictures too! This one may be a bit pricey for some but cheaper models are also available. It is easy to recharge and it is completely portable. The charging adapter is the size of a plug, with a fairly long USB lead. The device itself is about the size of a jacket pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Elfshopper197

customer_reviews.title: rather disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It's taking me much longer to get used to this version than previous models. Strange as It purports to be better and faster. I dislike intensely the keyboard font, not clear enough for aging eyesight. And why can't I sync a book when switching from one Kindle to another? I might try the May day button but currently am frustrated ! Also takes much longer to log on to email for some reason. My other Kindled have been so easy to use. I do love the magnetic case though, which came as a special offer at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: maggie pearson

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it now !! Kindle Fire HDX
customer_reviews.text: Love my kindle fire HDX ., one of the best presents I have received to date ., love the screen ., so crystal clear ., reading books is easy and love i player where I can download then watch it on the go., very easy to surf the net and has some great apps you can download for free I believe my husband got a great deal on this kindle for £90 which is a pure bargain. I also have an iPad but I find the kindle is easy to handle and it's not that heavy so you can hold it for longer if you're not resting your tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Sahara76

customer_reviews.title: Good with some disappointments
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand how one of the most popular tablets isn't compatible with loads of apps such as Sky Go, 4OD. Can find the screen a bit bright for reading sometimes but like the fact that I can see images and change the size easier than my old kindle. Do miss the dictionary. Never got the free Amazon vouchers promised when I bought it and no one seem to be able to give me an answer about it so let go so felt a little conned. SIM keeps getting dislodged. Good screen for watching stuff but if you don't want any app restrictions you're better off with Android. Can get more stuff on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Shame about the Ads...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new little Kindle Fire HDX but I hate, hate, HATE all the adverts on it. Apparently, they are supposed to be unintrusive but that is sadly not true. I've heard that you can have them removed but you have to pay for the privilege! Even though I come from a marketing background, I really don't like this world of advertising that invades our every action. So yes, the Kindle is awesome and does exactly what it says on the specs with crystal clear graphics and android apps but the ads will likely drive you mad... 😕
customer_reviews.author: Bear 75

customer_reviews.title: Fast and fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I certainly do love this tablet. Not having owned one before, I find it quite addictive. I like the way I can instantly check my emails, as opposed to my slow start computer. I like that the book covers are in colour and attractive and that I can read the books far more easily than on the basic book Kindle I have been using till now. I like that I can play a game on it when I am bored. I also like that I can do all these things lying in bed! The colour, sound and picture quality is excellent. Even my high tech son was impressed and rather annoyed he had bought something else!
customer_reviews.author: countrygirl

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant device
customer_reviews.text: It would be perfect if the camera could be used for taking pictures but it is only forward facing. Otherwise it is a brilliant buy. The battery life does not seem to be 10 hours if playing with the apps but it may be for reading. Prefer my paperwhite kindle for that. All in all, apart from being able to take photos this is much better than the i pad due to it being much lighter and easier to carry. The available free apps are also plentiful and fun. Screen and picture quality excellent. Recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A Kindle Triumph
customer_reviews.text: We were given our Kindle Fire HDX by our son and daughter in law, and have been delighted by it. Its features compare very well with Apple's iPad which is the only other tablet we have experience of. It has a good range of apps as well of course as the good library of Kindle books available from Amazon. An especially impressive and useful feature is the online Help button which brings on an assistant on screen, usually withing seconds who can give personal help either with advice in real time or even take over the machine to enable assistance. - a gold value service! Thoroughly recommendable all round
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: ... for my Kindle fire HD and it is a nice tablet. Pros
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an upgrade for my Kindle fire HD and it is a nice tablet. Pros: I like the face that the charger port is now on the side of the tablet Can play games which the other model cannot Nice size and lightweight Everything is easy to use Cons: Battery does need charging a lot more even when used for the same activities Speakers being on the rear means you can't lay flat or you get muffled sound
customer_reviews.author: Gwendlyn

customer_reviews.title: A value for money 7inch tablet
customer_reviews.text: Good graphics and easy to use, Comes with some good preloads which you can keep or remove. there are many free games or trials for downloading, also applications of which some are very good. Lightweight pocket size, looks and feels nice to handle. Downside being; it does not seem to be compatible with SKY, had to contact Amazon to get my Sky Email set up. I can receive Emails but not sure if reply's are being delivered to sender. Battery life does not seem to be the stated hours of usage, but I think this is the same with most tablets. Value for money, yes.
customer_reviews.author: Bazza

customer_reviews.title: My Kindle Fire HDX
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered a standard Kindle but was not happy entering text. It was too small. Anyway I wanted something for reading Ebooks so when the Fire HDX came out I bought it and have been very pleased with it. I also like the ease with which I can buy Ebooks from Amazon.. I would like to have been able to increase the memory with an SD card so that I could have added more of my music but unfortunately this is not available. I have two other tablets and of the three the Kindle is the best for reading so I am very satisfied with it and would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: RWJ Murley

customer_reviews.title: I like it, with reservations
customer_reviews.text: I like it, with reservations. I had a Kindle touch, which I wish I'd kept, but I wanted a small tablet so I plumped for this as my Wife has one and she loves it. Generally speaking it's good, but eh battery life sucks compared to a regular Kindle, which I wish I'd kept (I know, I repeat). Display is clear and reading is fine except if you're outside where glare is a real problem. Wish I'd... you know. It's bulkier than the Touch too. Why only a forward facing camera? Is this a narcissistic/selfie tool? Weird design.
customer_reviews.author: Special Circumstances

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire HDX
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the old style Kindle just to read books which was fine. However I am delighted with this newer version as there is so much more you can do ie watch videos surf the net email - great. It's light and portable, fits in my bag so I can take itout to read when we have hospital appointments - we all know how long you can be hanging about there. The picture quality is excellent in my view. I haven't managed to get ear phones to work as yet but I'm probably doing something wrong being a "silver surfer" it takes me a little longer to get my head round technology.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful tablet, does everything I do on my laptop
customer_reviews.text: My first Fire, having had a Paperwhite before. Very useful tablet, does everything I do on my laptop. I am not computer literate, and have used the help advisors several times. They are brilliantly patient, explaining all and often several times. Excellent service. My one small criticism is, that I found it heavy for just reading especially if lying down.I actually bought it for a forthcoming holiday, but felt I would uncomfortable trying to read all day on a beach. Because of this I then bought another Paperwhite, just for the reading and now am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: young oap

customer_reviews.title: Handy little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little gadget. I'm not very good with tech but this is very easy to work with. It was up and running straight out of the box and very easy to set up on my Amazon account. I've downloaded a few apps and use it to check my facebook and e-mails as well as a notebook, calendar and clock. Battery life is really good and re-charge time is quick. The camera works well and is a great fun extra. The screen is great, really clear, bright and lovely colours and the sound is good although a bit quiet, perhaps headphones would be good!! All in all I'd recommend as a useful, user friendly tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Jones

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire HDX 7
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. He had previously had a kindle for downloading books and loved this. The new Kindle was intended to open up his means of networking and, access to the internet etc as we found that access to our home computer was becoming a problem. We are still finding our way around this application although I must say that it is easy to navigate around and, that my son already seems to be an expert. The Kindle offers superb picture quality and, access to all types of applications. This is proving to be a very good purchase - one which I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: eixton shilo

customer_reviews.title: The Kindle Fire HDX 7" replaces both a Kindle reader and a heavy 10" Android tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected and more!! I have been very impressed with the speed of use on the Internet and in the sharpness and quality of display. I had been a little worried about using it for reading books as I had been using an original Kindle reader for a few years now - however I find the display much easier to read than my old Kindle and is great in any kind of lighting (or dark). It has also replaced a 10" Android tablet I have been using for a couple of years and the main Apps that were my favourites work just as well if not better despite the smaller size because of the sharpness of the display.
customer_reviews.author: A. Myatt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Kindle Fire HDX. Replacement for my Kindle Fire HD which I gave to my daughter as I could never get a hold of it, either she had it or my son had it. The laptop is now seldom used. This Kindle is slimmer, lighter, excellent sound quality, excellent screen and picture quality, use it for almost everything. I haven't had reason to use the new MayDay Help system yet. The only downside to owning a Kindle is the limited access to apps on Amazon. Amazon needs to sort themselves out and give Amazon account holders access to Apple Store or Google Store apps.
customer_reviews.author: MCL

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: I have had to have my Kindle Fire HDX replaced as the first one kept dropping out. However, it did show that I was connected, so I would turn off and on the wireless and then it would be fine until next time. Hence the change. I would like to say though that it is an impressive piece of kit and the service is brilliant. Very handy if you have an issue. It is very quick, easy to navigate and the picture quality is perfect. I've also used it to mirror to my TV and that was brilliant until the connection dropped. I am very pleased and I hope to have a couple of years of use.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: If you have the original Kindle this is certainly a worthy upgrade. Sharper display (1080p, 323 ppi), faster processing, double the ram and the operating system is upgradeable to the latest Amazon's Fire OS. I got mine at half price so was a double bargain, would highly recommend it for Kindle Fire users, and anyone that has an Amazon Prime, or those wanting an easy to use table. Obviously I would like to access the goggle play store and have a more unlocked operating system, but at this price and as I've used the previous version, I can not fault it was very happy to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Affray

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Little Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it, It more than met my expectations. I have put the Netflix app on it to watch films and the screen is crystal clear. I also have the iPad and at first I worried I would find the screen a bit small but no worries, this little cutie more than holds its own. It is easy to pop into my bag so i can use it anywhere. The only downside I can think of is that I will now be spending more money on books to read on my Kindle. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Keren Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an upgrade to my existing (old) Kindle. Primarily wanted a better display for when I read books but thought I'd splash out and get this instead of just a basic e-reader. Haven't been disappointed with my decision. It's a great tablet and very useful for a quick web search or to look at mail (better than waiting ages for my laptop to boot up!). The only thing I have noticed is the lack of playback of some videos that require flash content - I've not worked out if it's possible to download something to address this. Otherwise a great device.
customer_reviews.author: Mathsman

customer_reviews.title: fantastic device
customer_reviews.text: this is a fantastic device for complete entertainment..I use it for browsin the web and watchin movies..I think watchin movies on this device is better than watchin them on a big screen tv as the image quality is so sharp and lifelike its soo unbeilavable and for what lovefilm.com is chargin a month is nothin compared to all the movies you can stream..the only gripe I have on this divice is that I think the volume could sound a wee bit louder as ive owned a kindle fire hd previous generation and that sounded a lot louder,but amazon told me they have made the sound a lot cleaner on the hdx.but I would highly reccommend this device..its brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: simon love

customer_reviews.title: ok device
customer_reviews.text: I like this item however after using a laptop I find it irritating that tapping the envelope only gives messages I have to go onto Yahoo to check my junk box sect. I have a reading kindle but the books don't seem to flow well between both devices also it took me 20mins of contact with amazon to carry my books over. I would have liked some. further info on using it. The kindle fire is easily portable and lightweight to hold. I have yet to learn how to transfer my photos from my laptop. Maybe if I was younger it would be easy easier.
customer_reviews.author: beacon124

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed at the updates
customer_reviews.text: Annoyed at the updates because every time it updates it doesn't work properly for days, It forgets every word it had in English, almost completely resets to factory setting for almost everything automatically, and you can't get anyone to help because they are all too busy trying to figure out how to use the device to start with. A help desk should already know rather than staffing your lined with idiots try hiring people with skills and knowledge
customer_reviews.author: emiel

customer_reviews.title: great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this item and I do have a kindle fire hd7 which I brought 18 months ago and I love it so when I saw this on sale for £100 pound less and with 64gb which was £157.99 which I had to get at that price i paid £199.99 for my kindle fire hd7 32gb I have not yet tried watching a film but if it is better than the hd7 then it will be amazing listening to music is great to but saying that I do not have anything to compare it to as I have not had another table to test it with but for this price it's great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy that there is only a camera for 'selfies' and ...
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer to have an instruction book for the Kindle instead of having to go online. I am not happy that there is only a camera for 'selfies' and it's difficult to take a photo of something when you can't see what you are aiming at. My old Kindle was set up for my son's home's Wi-Fi but this one won't connect, even though I connected to my own without having to set it up. When I tried to get on to the 'help' lady it told me I needed an internet connection to access! Otherwise I get on OK, apart the spelling and grammatic errors in the books!
customer_reviews.author: Jwin

customer_reviews.title: It is great, kindle and tablet combined
customer_reviews.text: I received this just before Christmas and I love it, I have the Kindle with the keyboard which was a present to me about two years ago. I said that I would be keeping that except when I go on holiday and it is great when I go in the car, though now that I have had the Kindle Fire for a month I am not so sure as the Kindle Fire does everything that the Kindle does and more. I bought the Kindle Fire as I use the text to speech facility and the Kindle paper white does not have this facility. The speech in the Kindle Fire has also improved of the old kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle snappy

customer_reviews.title: Very poor service
customer_reviews.text: Watch out if your battery stops charging fully as nothing can be done & if you phone for help they hang up on you when you say your unhappy!! Apparently kindles can't be repaired or new batteries provided! Mine's only 18 months old. Rubbish customer service provided by the girl I spoke to who was clearly just reading from a script.
customer_reviews.author: 46jones58

customer_reviews.title: This is good
customer_reviews.text: I thought long and hard about what I really wanted - tablet or kindle. I decided that for what I need the kindle was exactly what I wanted. Not sure whether I should have had the bigger screen but in fairness the 7" version is very clear. The regular version is quick but Fire version is really fast. The time taken to boot up is only about 45 seconds, probably because I haven't loaded it with apps but even so. The product is reasonably light to hold when reading and the Origami case works well and looks good too. All in all, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Southfeild

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire HDX 7", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
customer_reviews.text: Amazon should point out that the mirrowing feature doesn't work on all tv's, I recently bought a 2015 Samsung smart tv which allows my sons and daughters phones to connect via mirrowing with no problems but the kindle won't have any of it, all it does is say connected but nothing shows on the screen, I've been on the customer help feature but they were unable to help me, also as others have said the volume is very poor, very disappointed with it.....saving up for a Samsung tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Kindle Fire HDX from Selfridges as they had it on offer for an incredible price. I love it, I wanted something very portable with a larger screen than my smart phone. I use my mobile as a wifi hotspot and have watched movies from the BBC iplayer app. I have also downloaded music from my iTunes account and from the Amazon music store. The sound is amazing as is the high definition screen. Don’t be put off by the lack of apps it is more than capable of doing all the things you want. I also own a Kindle paperwhite so didn’t buy it just for reading in colour either although this is a nice option.
customer_reviews.author: Dinkydora

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I had the Kindle Fire HD 7" for almost 2 years and then it just would not work. I think the battery went bad. Anyway I got this and I love it. I also got it during the Black Friday sale so I got a really good discount! I love discovering the updated features on this kindle. The mayday aspect is a brilliant new feature! And also while reading you can change the background colour to three different colours. I love the new layout.
customer_reviews.author: Leelee

customer_reviews.title: This is a device with a lot of good technology and features but too many flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is a device with a lot of good technology and features but too many flaws. Latest update means volume on speakers is virtually non existent and Amazon has done nothing about it for 3 months. Mayday is a very good service and Amazon do seem to take customer service seriously but then seem incapable of making the changes required. The app situation has not improved which are generally still extremely poor. Think carefully what you want this for before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Hypnostrad

customer_reviews.title: first timer, can't put it down
customer_reviews.text: I'm 60 and never had a tablet before and wasn't really interested in one. Daughter just gone to university so thought I would try one to help keep in touch. I've only had mine less than 3 weeks. It's absolutely brilliant. Works straight out the box, great screen, good colours, touch screen works great, fairly intuitive controls/menu. I use it for brosing web, checking/replying to emails, reading books. Battery life seems reasonable, 8_10 hours as advertised. And ive even started skyping which I had never been interested in in the past.
customer_reviews.author: ricard56

customer_reviews.title: SO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Bought NEW Kindle on Saturday, complained to Amazon on Monday about white reading screen that looked like sepia background with white splodges over it, arranged replacement BUT wasn't told this would be second-hand, refurbished model. It's going back. If I could give less than 1 star for customer satisfaction I would. My advice - don't buy any Kindles direct from Amazon. Device was very simple tablet, limited apps, dreadful screen, but the Wi-Fi was quick to load up and books downloaded quickly and it was light to hold. Amazon need too many personal details to set up Facebook, etc. There are much better, and cheaper, tablets out there. Very disappointed in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Norfolk

customer_reviews.title: I have great difficulty understanding the aps on this device
customer_reviews.text: I have great difficulty understanding the aps on this device. I have tried to download solitaire games such as spider and FreeCell without success. Yes I know that this is probably due to my own stupidity, nevertheless having looked forward to this device and the pleasure I felt on getting it for my birthday, I cannot help but wishing I had received something else. I am glad that I still have my old Kindle where I can read books without spending ages trying to retrieve books from cloud and eventually wanting to throw the device through the window.
customer_reviews.author: marie1862

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I am not a great expert on any thin tech. I was given this device mainly to help me with e-mail access but have found it so much more useful. I've found the screen size and resolution to be just right and have used it for watching tv I've missed, listening to audio books, radio & music from the cloud storage. internet access is great, haven't used it for Skype or similar yet but am sure this will be just as good. "The controls" are very intuitive, even I've managed to get my head around them. I would recommend this to anyone looking for this size of tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Shrek

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: It arrived charged so i was able to turn it on and use straight away, The picture is excellent, it is a nice size, small enough to carry around but big enough to get a good view of pictures and video. The hints and tutorials are quite useful for someone that has not used a tablet before. i have found my way around it quite easily. The only disappointment is the camera, i assumed that it would be outward facing, so that i could take pictures and video of things other than my face. I took 6 days to be dispatched but then arrived in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, Fast delivery - well packaged - Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, Fast delivery - well packaged - Thanks! It is the best screen I have seen on a tablet (I have the Nook HD+, iPad mini and Tesco Hudl ) it has the horsepower due to the quad core processor it and streams HD content flawlessly. My only regret is I should have paid the extra for the 8.9" version.
customer_reviews.author: peter kenny

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet but poor file sharing
customer_reviews.text: Good device with Amazon's own operating system and web browser. Only real disappointment is that files loaded directly on to the device such as ripped CD files cannot be shared between user profiles so to users can't share the same music but just create their own playlists, you have to load the files twice which just chews up storage capacity. Anything (books, music etc.) off your Amazon account is OK though but why would I want to upload 200 CDs worth of my bought and paid for music to a fee charging Amazon cloud account?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Aslett

customer_reviews.title: Truly fantastic device for the cost, I now love instant video and cloud drive even more!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet for the cost. Very impressive screen and sound quality, purchased during Black Friday and can't believe the spec considering it cost a quarter of what my 16GB iPad did! I have Amazon prime and use Amazon instant video and have all my photos to Amazon cloud drive which takes this device to the next level, couple that with the slick interface and this is a truly excellent device for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Kindle
customer_reviews.text: When I recieved my first Kindle I thought oh I'm never gonna use this I love books too much, but of course I soon started to do all my reading on my Kindle and ended up loving it. So when I recieved this as a present I thought no it cant replace my lovely Kindle. But no it doesnt replace it , it totally outshines it. So easy to set up and use, got all my apps on there that I want and I can read all my books from my old Kindle. Totally recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Cooper

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this. My phone and sat nav annoy me sometimes, but this Kindle has been more than I ever expected. Battery life is excellent, the clarity and speed of screen refresh is fantastic, the storage space is like a little Tardis, I cannot believe I have so many books (mostly non-fiction reference, not short novels), music collection and even TV series for the grandchildren to watch, all in such a compact unit!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: Well I've been umming and aahing about getting a kindle for ages - I previously had an iPad and thought this would be inferior - not at all! I am so happy with my new kindle! It's speedy, does everything I need, battery life seems good - Iisten to the radio on a night when I go to bed so it's left on all night - obviously depends what you're doing with it but battery lasts me about three days. Cannot find a fault with it yet and for £109 I got a bargain. Suits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitee

customer_reviews.title: it all looks so easy on the advert to get movies on but I ...
customer_reviews.text: it all looks so easy on the advert to get movies on but I was on the help[ line 3 times and then I bought a netgear adaptor as advised by your team and was on for almost an hour with your mayday man and still did not get it to working in fact it made our sky close down and we had to get some one to reset it any way I have sent the adaptor back to you. thanks to your team for trying so hard to get it working
customer_reviews.author: jenny shanley

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I received this kindle as a gift to replace my kindle fire HD (2nd generation). The jump up in quality was massive. Picture quality is beautiful, battery life lasts so much longer when streaming video. It also seems to charge much quicker as well. As with all kindles, its no-nonsense interface makes it so simple to use. Honestly though, the biggest plus point for this tablet was the price. I got it on offer for a mere £150! Its that perfect balance between quality and affordability. I also have an iPad, but find myself coming back to my kindle time after time. Thank you, Amazon for making such a great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: HDX HD brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant battery life, very clear HD screen, the layout is better than the HD kindle previously and the volume buttons at the back are a great feature as the HD never had these before. And the on off button is also something the HD never had. Good for downloading items from the Internet and reading later and the web page is so much quicker, and sharper and more efficient than the previous oneOnly 1 tiny snag I have is the gate u sometimes get from the screen if your sat in too much light but overall job well done!
customer_reviews.author: rach86

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use
customer_reviews.text: The new Fire HDX was an update on an older Fire and a tempting Black Friday Bargain. Pleasingly, it's much lighter than the old one. The tablet is great for tweeting, reading, streaming etc. The Fire aims to be an easy-to-use device and it doesn't disappoint in that respect. If you've never tried a tablet, the Fire might be a good starting point. I haven't needed Mayday (on board live help) but no other tablet that I know of (at the time of writing) has this kind of help.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeLover

customer_reviews.title: Kindle fire HDX 7"
customer_reviews.text: Having been given this tablet for Christmas by my son I have one criticism the instructions are too limited for someone who has never used a tablet or a smart phone. My son got me going with the basics but if he had not been with me I would have foundered and probably been put of all together. As it is I have now down loaded a number of apps including bbciplayer, bbc news, a couple of books and one or to more apps. I use it every day and find it great so quick and the screen is great though I find it tricky if I am view documents which are email attachments.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new kindle hdx. It is faster than the one I had and better wi fi in the back of the house. I don't really see much difference to my old one in any other way. Some apps don't work as well,tune in radio lets me have radio devon on my old kindle,but not on new one. Create and craft plays up. Lots of little improvements on this one. I am happy too because it is much lighter. Always reliable,not had to use may day button at all and I just love kindle. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mothers christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my mom for christmas 2013, as she loves books and reading i thought she would love this as she already had the normal e-ink kindle. She likes it as the internet is on it and she has all these books she can download so fir her shes happy. but for me its not something i would buy. The specs of the device are brilliant and I think it could be a really good device, but Amazon have shot themselves in the foot by not including the play store. the apps available are extremely limited and because of this I wouldnt buy this for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - my best purchase of 2013
customer_reviews.text: I've been after one of these since I purchased one for my mother and she really raved about it! Delighted with my Christmas pressie, can now read anywhere, including in the dark, car, beach etc. already read 7 books and we are only mid way through January (that's normally my quota for the whole year!,) books are sooo much cheaper and so easy to purchase with no trips to the book shops, downloaded straight away. It's so easy to set up and use, can catch up with emails, go online - my iPad is now gathering dust!! Oh and let's not forget its handbag size!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J C Grant

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, picture perfect and very quick. The reason I only gave it 3 stars is no where did I see anything about it not being compatible for flash player, if you want to use Facebook or many other sites you cannot watch videos that goes with it, if I had known this I would not have purchased my kindle. I know there are ways around this but there shouldn't be any need to, when I went to the May day I was told there is no ans to sort this in the near future and to use my laptop or computer to watch the videos, what's the point. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 years and then died
customer_reviews.text: During the 4 years I had this it worked well, but if the life span of this product is so short and kindle said to me that they only can guarantee a year without something going wrong, then I recommend buy a cheaper one. I could have brought 10 cheaper kindles for the price I paid. So go for cheaper models or buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Judith Ellis

product_meta.title: Kindle Fire HDX 7", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers (Previous Generation - 3rd)
feature_bullets: Exclusive 7" HDX display (1920x1200), high pixel density (323 ppi) and perfect colour accuracy (100% sRGB) for vivid, lifelike images that go beyond standard HD
The fastest processor on a 7" tablet - powerful 2.2GHz quad-core processor and 2GB of RAM for fast, fluid gaming, video and multi-tasking
Introducing the "Mayday" button - revolutionary, on-device tech support. Get free assistance from an Amazon expert 24x7, 365 days a year
